titles.title: Many are they that rise up against me,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Many are they that rise up against me,
Many are they that say,
'There is no help for him in God;
There is no help for him in God.'
But Thou, O Lord, art a shield for me
The lifter of my head
I cried to the Lord, and He delivered me
And He sustained me,
I cried to the Lord, and He delivered me
And He sustained me.
Arise, O Lord! Arise, O Lord,
And save me!
